com.sorcix.sirc

Class IrcServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sorcix.sirc.IrcServer

  • public class IrcServer
extends Object
    Contains information about an IRC server.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Sorcix

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static int DEFAULT_PORT
      Default port (6667)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IrcServer(String address)
      Creates a new (non-SSL) IrcServer on default port.
      IrcServer(String address, int port, String password, boolean secure)
      Creates a new IrcServer.
      IrcServer(String address, String password)
      Creates a new (non-SSL) IrcServer.

         int port,

        Parameters:

        port - The server port.
        password - The password to use (or null).
        secure - Whether to use SSL.

        Checks whether this server is using SSL.
        Returns:
